python:
from yolobit import *
button_a.on_pressed = None
button_b.on_pressed = None
button_a.on_pressed_ab = button_b.on_pressed_ab = -1
from event_manager import *
import time
import sys
import uselect

event_manager.reset()

def read_terminal_input():
  spoll=uselect.poll()        # Set up an input polling object.
  spoll.register(sys.stdin, uselect.POLLIN)    # Register polling object.

  input = ''
  if spoll.poll(0):
    input = sys.stdin.read(1)

    while spoll.poll(0):
      input = input + sys.stdin.read(1)

  spoll.unregister(sys.stdin)
  return input

def on_event_timer_callback_i_l_g_C_t():
  global vao, check, temp
  vao = read_terminal_input()
  check = vao[-1 : ]
  if check == '%' or check == '?' or check == '/' or check == '&':
    print((''.join([str(x) for x in ['!6:AI:', vao, '#']])), end =' ')

event_manager.add_timer_event(200, on_event_timer_callback_i_l_g_C_t)

if True:
  display.scroll('OK')

while True:
  event_manager.run()
  time.sleep_ms(1000)
  time.sleep_ms(10)
